attributes.additional_details:
ENFORCE FAIR PLAY IN EMPLOYMENT FOR BRITISH WORKERS IN BRITISH JOBS, BY LEGALLY FORCING ALL EMPLOYERS ,BOTH PUBLIC AND PRIVATE TO OPENLY PUBLISH THE NUMBERS OF THEIR NON BRITISH EMPLOYEES THEY EMPLOY , AS A PERCENTAGE OF THEIR WORKFORCE AND ALSO THE ACTUAL NUMBERS IN THEIR LOCAL AND NATIONAL OPERATIONS.
LEGISLATING THIS ISSUE ,WOULD FORCE / SHAME ALL BRITISH COMPANIES TO GIVE BRITISH WORKERS A FAIR CHANCE FOR WORK.
